DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History Performed Observation Outcome Baseline Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The case history of a subject as recalled by the subject. Specifies whether the value associated with or derived from a specified activity can be used as the reference point against which subsequent values may be compared in order to determine the outcome of a particular process, procedure, or intervention.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History Performed Observation Outcome Baseline Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A starting point to which things may be compared.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval.  mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
